_description: Carol on epiphany, or slaughter of the innocents — two quatrains (abcb) including refrain, ‘Vox in rama audita est’ plus burden: ‘Syng we now þe holy feste / Vox in rama audita est’

OxfLinLat141.First Lines:
Rachel þat wepyth withowt consolacounffor her chylderne is ded
                    þat suke[d] her brest…
OxfLinLat141.Last Lines:
…This glorius blod was offyrd to hevynffor vox in rama
                        audita est
OxfLinLat141.Editions:
Palti,  Kathleen. 
             “An Unpublished Fifteenth-Century Carol Collection: Oxford, Lincoln
                College MS Lat. 141.” 
             Medium Aevum.
         77 (2008): 260-78: 264-5.
